trans-unit.source: Contains the data sent to a tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Contém os dados enviados para um serviço de acompanhamento pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução quando um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> é correspondido.

trans-unit.source: It is also used in the return list of the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Ela também é usada na lista de retorno da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance.ActivityEvents" />.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, it sends an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução corresponde um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> em uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>, envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> para o serviço de controle sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associada ao controle de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The tracking service can perform whatever action is needed on the data in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: O serviço de acompanhamento pode executar qualquer ação é necessária nos dados no registro de controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: O construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que identifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the parent activity of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que identifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> da atividade pai da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that indicates the date and time of the activity status event associated with the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> que indica a data e a hora do evento de status de atividade associadas ao registro de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: The relative order in which the activity status event associated with this tracking record occurred in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: A ordem relativa em que o evento de status de atividade associado a este registro de acompanhamento ocorreu na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: This field is not set for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Esse campo não é definido para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> class by using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> usando os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) da atividade associada a esse <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the activity for which this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da atividade para o qual o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ActivityType%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ActivityType%2A> é definido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> correspondido.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> that contains the annotations that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that corresponds to this tracking record.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> que contém as anotações que estão associadas a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> que corresponde a este registro de controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains any data extracted from the workflow for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma lista que contém os dados extraídos do fluxo de trabalho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" /> correspondido.

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" /> objects each of which contains a single piece of extracted data and its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem" /> objetos cada uma delas contém uma única parte dos dados extraídos e suas anotações associadas.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure can extract data from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> for encontrada, o controle de tempo de execução infraestrutura pode extrair dados da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The data to be extracted is specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a ser extraído são especificados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can contain two kinds of objects: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the activity associated with the activity status event; and, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects specify member data to be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Extracts%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> pode conter dois tipos de objetos: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objetos especificam dados de membro a ser extraído da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade; e, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos especificam dados de membro a ser extraído da atividade raiz do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Both of these extract types can also specify annotations to be returned with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Ambos esses tipos de extrair também pode especificar as anotações a serem retornados com os dados extraídos.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure encapsulates each piece of extracted data and its associated annotations in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>, and adds this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução encapsula cada parte dos dados extraídos e suas anotações associadas em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>e adiciona esses <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Context of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Contexto da atividade.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que identifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" /> for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre <see langword="null" /> para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" />) for an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" />) para um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> has no meaning for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> and is always a null reference (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> não tem nenhum significado para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> e é sempre uma referência nula (`Nothing`).

trans-unit.source: This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time that the activity status event occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a data e a hora em que o evento do status da atividade ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> is Greenwich Mean Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime> é hora de Greenwich (UTC).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventDateTime%2A> é definido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the order in the workflow instance of the activity status event that matched the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordem na instância de fluxo de trabalho do evento de status da atividade que corresponde a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the order of the activity status event in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica a ordem do evento de status de atividade na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indicates the relative order of the event that matched the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> within the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> indica a ordem relativa do evento que corresponde a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is unique within a workflow instance, but it is not guaranteed to be sequential.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> é exclusivo dentro de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas não é garantido para ser sequenciais.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.EventOrder%2A> é definido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the execution status of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o status de execução da atividade associada a este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" />.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance only emits activity status events when the execution status of an activity instance changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho só emite eventos de status de atividade quando muda o status de execução de uma instância de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Therefore an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can only be matched when an activity execution status change occurs.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> só pode ser correspondido quando ocorre uma alteração de status de execução de atividade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> contains the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> that triggered the match and caused the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to be sent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> contém o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus?displayProperty=nameWithType> que disparou a correspondência e causou o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> para serem enviadas.

trans-unit.source: It reflects the current status of the activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Ele reflete o status atual da instância de atividade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.ExecutionStatus%2A> é definido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: Context of the parent activity.
trans-unit.target: Contexto da atividade pai.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> that identifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> of the activity associated with the activity status event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que identifica o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> da atividade associada ao evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identifier of the activity associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o identificador da atividade associada a este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> for which this tracking record was created.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName" /> do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> para que este registro de rastreamento foi criado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.QualifiedName%2A> is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.QualifiedName%2A> é definido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.
